problema.title: The Problem
problema.description: Projects launched without consistent viability. Undersized capital structures. Difficulty accessing structured credit. High risk in contracting and execution. Result: loss of value, delay and insecurity.

viabilidade.title: Viability
viabilidade.pain: The project seems good, but I'm not sure if it really holds up financially.
viabilidade.solution: We structure complete economic-financial viability studies, with cash flow modeling, scenarios and clear return indicators, enabling safe decisions before acquisition or launch.

terreno.title: Land
terreno.pain: I have land opportunities, but I don't know which one really makes sense for my portfolio.
terreno.solution: We analyze the financial viability of the land within the developer's strategy, considering risk, return, capital structure and impact on the group's cash flow.

caixa.title: Cash Flow
caixa.pain: The development sells well, but the cash flow doesn't close as expected.
caixa.solution: We restructure the development's cash flow, identify financial bottlenecks and adjust assumptions to ensure predictability, control and sustainability throughout execution.

credito.title: Credit / Caixa Econômica
credito.pain: I have difficulty approving and contracting financing with Caixa.
credito.solution: We act technically in structuring and conducting operations with Caixa Econômica Federal, organizing documentation, assumptions and interface with engineering, legal and credit.

capital.title: Capital
capital.pain: I don't know the best combination between equity, investors and debt.
capital.solution: We define the most efficient capital structure for each development, balancing debt and equity to reduce financial cost, improve return and make the project viable.

governanca.title: Governance
governanca.pain: Lack of financial clarity for strategic business decisions.
governanca.solution: We deliver structured financial models that serve as a basis for governance, decision-making, bank negotiations and alignment with investors.

solucao.title: The BIIG Solution
solucao.description: BIIG structures the development in an integrated way, combining financial intelligence, technical solidity and institutional experience. Right decision → Right capital → Safe execution. +R$ 7 billion in structured financial modeling. +R$ 1.3 billion in VGV enabled with Caixa. Acting on projects of high technical and financial complexity.

cta.title: Ready to structure your project?
cta.description: BIIG reduces risks, structures capital and ensures predictability in the implementation of real estate developments.

diagnostico.title: 1. Diagnosis
diagnostico.description: Deep understanding of the need, objectives and current situation of the development, considering financial, technical and strategic aspects. This stage forms the foundation for building the scope and premises of the project.

escopo.title: 2. Scope of Work
escopo.description: Clear definition of the method, deliverables and execution stages, aligned with the client's reality and objectives. The scope guides deadlines, responsibilities and success criteria.

desenvolvimento.title: 3. Development
desenvolvimento.description: Execution of consulting based on a structured operational and managerial track. Includes technical analyses, modeling, stakeholder interactions and continuous monitoring.

entrega.title: 4. Delivery
entrega.description: Completion of services with delivery of technical documentation, financial models, reports and consolidated guidelines for decision-making and execution of the development.

revisao.title: 5. Review
revisao.description: Monitoring of the delivered solution, with adjustments, validations and improvements, ensuring practical adherence and evolution of the client's team.

priscila.bio1: Executive with over 15 years of experience in finance and real estate development structuring, working on economic-financial modeling of projects totaling more than R$ 7 billion, supporting strategic decisions, governance and financial predictability for developers.
priscila.bio2: Founder & Managing Partner of BIIG – Brasil Inteligência Imobiliária e Gestão, leads the financial structuring of developments and the viability of capital raising operations for projects with VGV exceeding R$ 1.3 billion, with Caixa Econômica Federal.
priscila.bio3: Graduated in Accounting and Administration, with MBAs in Financial Management and Real Estate Development and Construction from FGV.

sobre.text1: BIIG operates at the intersection of finance, engineering and real estate strategy, structuring developments from investment decision to capital contracting.
sobre.text2: BIIG is born with the purpose of transforming ideas into solid real estate developments, connecting capital, purpose and execution through strategic management, financial intelligence and technical excellence.
sobre.text3: We work to structure safe decisions, reduce risks and ensure predictability, with the ambition of becoming a national reference in strategic management of developments and structuring of real estate investments — a company born in the North, prepared to operate throughout Brazil.
